link.title: Coldwater High School - News

form.name: aspnetForm

span.p: As per the Governor of Mississippi, Tate County Schools will be closed through May. Check this website for any upcoming information.

div.h1: Welcome to the Tate County Schools District website!

p.span: Welcome to the Tate County Schools District website. The Tate County School District is dedicated to developing the whole child. Our county school system consists of Independence High School, East Tate Elementary, Coldwater Elementary School, Coldwater High School, Strayhorn Elementary, Strayhorn High School, and the Tate County Career and Technical Center.

We have a dedicated staff of administrators, teachers, and support personnel who strive every day to put children first. It is an honor and privilege to work with and alongside these dedicated professionals and staff. We are very fortunate to have tremendous community support for our schools. Without this
it would be virtually impossible to achieve success.
It is the mission of Tate County Schools to prepare ALL students to be college and career ready and develop a lifelong love for learning.

span.p: The Tate County School District has announced the dates for registration of students for the 2020-2021 school year.

TCSD Grab and Go Lunch Program End Date

span.p: The TCSD Grab and Go Lunch Program will be ending April 30th, 2020.

img.alt: Details about grab and go lunch

div.p: The honor of our SES 2019-2020 teacher of the year goes to our beloved Second Grade Teacher, Sandra Moyer. Sandra is a mentor to her colleagues and is known for her kindness and her gentle way of leading her students to grow academically and personally each time she is with them.

img.alt: Sandra Moyer - Teacher of the Year

em.q: "Together, there is no limit to what we can achieve"
